prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Strings, Guitar, Synth Lead, Piano, Bass, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
No Drums are present in this song, but it does feature Strings, Guitar, Synth Lead, Piano, and Bass.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Strings, Guitar, Synth Lead, Piano, and Bass, but without the addition of Drums.

Style 3:
This piece is made up of Strings, Guitar, Synth Lead, Piano, and Bass - no Drums included.
